frame.name: Deciding
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a <fen>Decision</fen>, which may be about an entity or a course of action.
How (and whether) this frame is distinct from Choosing is currently up for debate.</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides on a course of action.
<ex><fex name="Cog">Mo</fex> <t>decided</t> to quit the program.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Decision
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Decision</fen> identifies the entity or course of upon which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides. <ex>Mo <t>decided</t> <fex name="Dec">to quit the program</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Possibilities
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a <fen>Decision</fen> from among a set of <fen>Possibilities</fen>.
<ex>Mo <t>decided</t> on the blue sweater <fex name="Poss">from the pile on the counter</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time or time period over which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
<ex>The State Cabinet <fex name="tim">today</fex> <t>decided</t> to file an appeal in the Supreme Court seeking an extension of six months for implementation of its judgment</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The place where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
<ex><fex name="pla">At the first</fex> crossroad we <t>decided</t> to wait.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: decide.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: come to a resolution in the mind as a result of consideration

lexUnit.name: decision.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a conclusion or resolution reached after consideration
